text: My mom has always said that if I get a big head, she'll take me out of this business as quickly as I got into it.
author: Chloe Moretz

text: I just got my phone back yesterday. My mom had it for two days. I was supposed to read a book and I really wanted to play Call Of Duty.
author: Chloe Moretz

text: My mom won't let me buy high-fashion stuff unless it's TK Maxx or a birthday occasion.
author: Chloe Moretz

text: The one thing my mom will let me get is a nice shoe sometimes.
author: Chloe Moretz

text: My mom won't let anyone treat me like a little princess.
author: Chloe Moretz
